notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: X.Y., Q.G. and W.W. designed research; X.Y., L.P., Z.M., O.B., D.C., and H.Z. performed research; Z.M., L.P., and X.Y. contributed new reagents/analytic tools; X.Y., Z.M., L.P., O.B. and W.W. analyzed data; X.Y., Z.M., collected samples; and X.Y., W.W., L.P., D.C., and O.B. wrote the paper. All authors reviewed the manuscript.
